india:
Early Neolithic culture with first confirmed semi permanent settlements appeared 11000 years ago in the Bhimbetka rock shelters in modern Madhya Pradesh, India. Some of the Stone Age rock paintings found among the Bhimbetka rock shelters are approximately 30,000 years old.[1]

The ancient history of the region includes some of South Asia's oldest settlements[2] and some of its major civilisations.[3][4]
